item.title: Creación de Pruebas Unitarias con Spock y Groovy
Herramientas básicas para desarrollo de software
Introducción a React JS
item.description: React JS Library JS: SPA’s Created by Facebook Components: encapsulate, re-use presentation: JSX, css logic: ECS6, state managment Making a react app Pre-requisites: node Install create-react-app: npm install -g create-react-app Create the app: create-react-app blog-app You must replace “blog-app” by your own app name Making first app (part 2) Start the app: Change into folder “blog-app” and execute next command

item.title: Flutter Intro
item.description: Basic Concepts Multiplataform Mobile Apps Development SDK Created by Google Dart Language Created like option to javascript It is compiled into native ARM code Basic Concepts (part 2) Own render engine Skia based Own great widget library No longer version problems Official development framework for Fucshia Install Flutter Download SDK Extract file in a location Add tool to your path Run flutter doctor Check output and perform the tasks for finish setup Set up an editor (Android Studio, Xcode, Visual Studio Code) Install guide
